name: KSLANews12
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from KSLA News 12 Shreveport, Louisiana within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Shreveport, Louisiana area from the KSLA News 12 Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
